author: Staff Reporter
text:
Kattoor Police have registered a case against three transgenders for alleged theft of Rs. 21,000 from M. Abirami (23) at her house at Annapoorana Layout in Siddhapudur, on Tuesday. .

The police said that the transgenders asked for a donation, for which the victim gave Rs. 100.

The three allegedly over powered her and fled with Rs. 21,000 from the house. Efforts were under way to arrest them.
title: Case registered against transgenders
